snippet: Andy Murray’s victory in the United States Open capped a summer of accomplishment for British athletes, from tennis to the London Games to the golf course.
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray’s victory in the United States Open capped a summer of accomplishment for British athletes, from tennis to the London Games to the golf course.

headline.seo: For Britain, a Good Sporting Summer, Quite
headline.main: In Britain, a Stunner of a Summer, Quite
headline.print_headline: In Britain, a Stunner Of a Summer, Quite
